entry.title: Ecopax - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container Black 5.94"x 5.5"x 3.38"- 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ecopax
Type: Disposables
Price: 42.99

Ecopax - 225 - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container - 4 x 125/Case

1-Comp, Non-Vented, Hinged Foam Containers, Ceres/Plain
Size: 
5.94 x 5.5 x 3.38

Convenient and efficient, this foam container is perfect for your take out service or packaging patrons' leftovers. From to-go cheesesteaks at your Italian restaurant to cold cut subs in your cafe, this all-purpose clamshell container is a reliable and convenient item for your business. The design is ideal for hot and cold subs, side orders, appetizers, kids' meals, and more! Featuring a hinged lid, this container can be quickly and easily closed to keep up with the fast-paced environment of your restaurant or take out venue.

With secure closure tabs, this tightly sealed container is protected against accidental openings and spills during transport, giving your guests peace of mind knowing their meal is tightly contained. Plus, the insulated foam construction ensures your patrons' food remains hot or chilled until they are ready to eat, plus the foam material makes it a more cost-efficient option over other materials.

Streamline your takeout service with this foam hinged lid container. Made of foamed polystyrene, this container is conveniently lightweight, but still able to support heavy foods. To prevent unwanted messes and spills, this container features a double locking lid closure, allowing for safe, convenient transport. Plus, the non-absorbent foam construction prevents any liquids from leaking through. With the ability to hold cold and hot foods, this foam vessel is great for serving guests at your picnic, party, or catered event!

Featuring a classic hinged lid design, this container offers convenience and a compact style to suit your takeout needs. In addition, each container has molded-in stacking rims, allowing customers to safely carry multiple meals at once. This clamshell container is also insulated to reduce heat transfer, and keep hot and cold dishes at the proper serving temperature throughout an entire meal. Once all the food is gone, enjoy a quick and effortless clean-up thanks to its convenient disposability.

entry.title: Pactiv - YHLW-1001 Foam Hinged Container 1 Compartment Extra Large - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pactiv
Type: Disposables
Price: 66.99

9.5" x 10.5" x 3.25" Foam Extra Large 1-Compartment Hinged-Lid Takeout Container, White, 250 ct.


The YHLW-1001 Pactiv Foam Hinged Container is an economic solution to your fast food service takeout needs. These containers feature an unique double locking (smartlock) hinge that holds the container tightly closed. Insulates both cold and hot foods. Containers are stack-able which improves transportation performance.

entry.title: MC - 12" x 7" x 17" Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 69.99

These brown shopping bags are a simple way to provide convenience to both you and your patrons!

Whether used for toting loaves of freshly baked bread or crisp vegetables and sweet, juicy fruits, these sturdy shopping bags will accommodate your customers' purchases easily, and won't break while carrying heavy loads. Because they're so durable, the bags can even be reused to help you and your shoppers be environmentally-friendly.

 

Durable Kraft Paper

Made from durable, brown kraft paper, these heavyweight bags have a basis weight and will carry heavy loads of produce, bakery items, and other purchases.

Rectangular Foundation

The rectangular foundation allows for it to stand alone for convenient packing and unpacking.

Twisted Handles

With twisted handles, these bags make all purchases easy for customers to carry.

MC - 12x7x17 Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack

entry.title: McCall's - 1 Lb. White Paper Bag With Window & Tin Tie Closure - 25/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 19.99

A creative package for displaying cookies & treats!

Perfect for packing cookies, cake pops and other baked goods, this tin tie cookie bag is just what your bakery, coffee shop or grocery store needs! Each bag features a clear window so customers can have a sneak peak at the goodies galore stored inside! To ensure freshness, each bag has a tin tie that allows bags to be resealed, which is attached to the back of the bag unless other placement is requested. Send your food out fresh and in style!

  • Laminated poly liner keeps contents fresh.
  • FDA and USDA compliant.
  • Metal tabs allow easy opening and a secure closure.

entry.title: WFN - S4 Printed White Biodegradable Shopping Bags 18" x 22" - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: BulkMart
Type: Disposables
Price: 27.99

Take a green step forward with this biodegradable plastic t-shirt bag.

For a tough and durable plastic bag, choose this biodegradable t-shirt bag. With the same heat / cold tolerance and shelf life as traditional plastic bags, this environmentally-friendly option provides the same convenience without the wastefulness and damaging carbon footprint

Biodegradable, Reusable, and Recyclable

Made from environmentally friendly, recyclable HDPE material, this bag's construction allows decomposition. It fully breaks down much faster than other bags, therefore lowering your carbon footprint!

Attractive Color

The attractive color, along with the leafy design, is a step up from white plastic bags, while also demonstrating the bag's eco-friendliness.

Dual Handles

Great for carrying heavy items, the dual handles make this bag perfect for grocery stores, delis, take-out restaurants and more!

Both convenient and eco-friendly, t-shirt bags are perfect for grocery stores, delis, and take-out restaurants. They are just like regular plastic t-shirt bags, but are biodegradable and healthier for the environment!

Provide your customers with a durable bag for toting their purchases in with these T-shirt bags. These quality bags are made to resist ripping and tearing. This sturdy bag has the ability to successfully hold good weight! Its durable construction means that fewer bags can be used per customer, cutting down on cost.

Ideal for grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, and retail locations, lightweight T-shirt bag is perfect for bringing home groceries, to-go containers of food, or merchandize. The bag is thick and resists rips and tears to keep items from breaking through the material and falling out of the bag. Combined with the rip and tear resistant material, this bag also features convenient cutout handles for easy carrying. Furthermore, this bag is a cost effective and it can easily be recycled.

The design is ideal for hot and cold subs, side orders, appetizers, kids' meals, and more! Featuring a hinged lid, this container can be quickly and easily closed to keep up with the fast-paced environment of your restaurant or take out venue.

With secure closure tabs, this tightly sealed container is protected against accidental openings and spills during transport, giving your guests peace of mind knowing their meal is tightly contained. Plus, the insulated foam construction ensures your patrons' food remains hot or chilled until they are ready to eat, plus the foam material makes it a more cost-efficient option over other materials.

Streamline your takeout service with this foam hinged lid container. Made of foamed polystyrene, this container is conveniently lightweight, but still able to support heavy foods. To prevent unwanted messes and spills, this container features a double locking lid closure, allowing for safe, convenient transport. Plus, the non-absorbent foam construction prevents any liquids from leaking through. With the ability to hold cold and hot foods, this foam vessel is great for serving guests at your picnic, party, or catered event!

Featuring a classic hinged lid design, this container offers convenience and a compact style to suit your takeout needs. In addition, each container has molded-in stacking rims, allowing customers to safely carry multiple meals at once. This clamshell container is also insulated to reduce heat transfer, and keep hot and cold dishes at the proper serving temperature throughout an entire meal. Once all the food is gone, enjoy a quick and effortless clean-up thanks to its convenient disposability.
